p: Heteromorpha arborescens (Spreng.) Cham. and Schltdl (Apiaceae) can be referred to as a large shrub, small or medium deciduous tree [ 5]. It is regarded as an important medicinal plant throughout its distribution area in tropical Africa and has been used for the treatment of many ailments including helminthiasis [ 6], abdominal pains, infertility, nervous disorders, and tuberculosis [ 5]. The plant is popularly known in parts of Africa for its therapeutic benefits and is therefore included in the monographic treatment of medicinal plants of South African medicine [ 7].
